segments.text: This is infuriating, what a careless mess in that kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The faucet's running wild, flooding everything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That woman just stands there, polishing her plate like nothing's wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot's in the water, and she doesn't even flinch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now the kids are climbing on an unstable stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's reaching into the cookie jar, risking a fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's egging him on, hand out for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Open cabinets, tipped stoolâ€”it's a hazard zone.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water damage everywhere, and no one's fixing it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The peaceful garden view mocks the chaos inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can they be so oblivious to the dangers?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand watching this irresponsibility.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to turn off that faucet now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes stacked high, just waiting to crash.
segments.speaker: PAR
